Author: peony_cloud
Text: Just gotta say, as someone with an autoimmune disease (mine affects the GI tract directly)... illness-related weight loss and/or digestive issues can 100% send someone spiraling into anorexia if they have a history or predisposition to it.  I got severely ill with an inflammatory bowel disease a few years ago and it ruined my then-recovery from AN. At one point when I started being able to digest food again, I almost wished to be sick just because it was so goddamn easy to lose weight â€” and that's a pretty fucked-up thought.
